name: Johns Basics of spelling
description:
Do you like reading the Spelling of great writers? How many books have you read in school over the past year? John is a teacher who makes you love books the way he loves them! Well here is where John Takes place! a strict spelling teacher! if you miss a class, or get anything wrong on purpose, or if you forget your homework, he will stab you with a knife! *items are not yet programed in the game yet!*

Features:

 - unique characters; - The developed world of school with its own characteristics; 

 - the tense atmosphere of the game; -

 - unforgettable adventures;

 - The basics of spelling  in school and not only.

CONTROLS the arrow keys on screen! touch papers to collect them!

well sadly this game is not avalable for ios and pc! an ios version might come soon! with windows you can download Blue Stacks on your pc!

DONT FORGET TO PUT SPACES BETWEEN LETTERS WHILE SPELLING! STORY: You Forgot your homework, but you did not do well on spelling! so as he saw you, he teached you to spell! but, then you got one wrong he tried to get you, but he has poor eyesight! and you tried to get all 9 papers witch one is yours? can you do it?
